column5: ENERGY EE is an EIPHI graduate School Master focusing on Research & Innovation in the field of Energy production and storage and management. Electrical energy is the main concern of this degree with a focus on hydrogen energy systems.Like all the Master Degree of EIPHI Graduate school, this master is designed for R&D engineer positions in big international companies or smaller High-Tech industries but can also be the springboard for a career as Researcher or Professor.Energy Master Students can pursue their studies with a Ph.D. in the Energy Department of Femto-St Research Lab or Belfort’s Fuel Cell Laboratory FC Lab presented thereafter.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
